name: Making Mr. Right Trivia Game | M | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
John Malkovich.

	One of the few comedic roles to date (2002) that we are able to see John Malkovich in.

questions.text: Ulysses goes into space at the end of the movie.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Dr. Jeff Peters actually takes his place so that Ulysses can stay and be with Frankie Stone.

questions.text: What type of car did Ulysses order for Frankie?
questions.explanation:
Cadillac.

	It is a burgundy Cadillac El Dorado Convertible.

questions.text: What actress played Frankie's best friend, Trish?
questions.explanation:
Glenne Headley.

	Glenne Headley was also married to John Malkovich during the production of this film.

questions.text: Frankie's ex-boyfriend was running for what political office?
questions.explanation:
Congress.

	Congressman Steve Marcus -- It takes a man this sensitive to know your needs.

questions.text: What was the name of the doctor that hired Frankie to work at Chemtec?
questions.explanation:
Dr. Ramdis

	Interesting note - he drove a Gold Pontiac Fiero in the film.

questions.text: What is the name of the song that is playing at the beginning of the movie when Frankie is driving to her office?
questions.correct: Too Many Fish in the Sea
options: Breaking Up Is Hard To Do
questions.explanation:
Too Many Fish in the Sea.

	She shaves her legs and puts her makeup on while driving to work.

questions.text: Laurie Metcalf from "Roseanne" plays Sandy in the movie.
questions.explanation:
True.

	She bought her own pearl errings using her American Express card while on her date with Ulysses.  She thought he was Dr. Peters.

questions.text: Susan Seidelman directed this film.  What other film from the mid-80's did she also direct?  (It starred a very popular singer.)
questions.explanation:
Desperately Seeking Susan.

	The popular singer, of course, being Madonna.
